title: Ok but this new Aatrox buff is literally Spear of Sojin without the full item or the need to aa
body: Yeah, I'm pretty sure Riot is running out of ideas for how they should balance their game. Nothing was op with {{champion:266}} besides his early game harass and ability to team fight in the lcs. Now, that they realize removing his second e was bad and not nerfing his Q damage was a mistake, they hide it behind his new free {{item:3161}} ult and pretend like they didn't gut out depressed demon boy.

> Change got pulled.

Wait, really?! Now I feel like I wasted my time posting this! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Eh, its not a waste. You're one of the many who don't agree with the change, myself included. If they want to weaken his pro, they gotta give him some of his old kit functionality, that way it balances it out. A champ becomes a nightmare to balance when it strays from the path it was placed on, especially one that was completely reworked and overhauled from the ground up for everything and has practically no semblance of old anywhere on the kit (GA is GA, I honestly could care less).

I don't agree with Rune Prison giving Ryze a ton of mana back (turned out to be just a test run for the Akali W imo) but I do agree with making it a slow/empowered W is a root and E does true damage to keep Ryze playable in low elo without being cancer in LCS. 
The only other way they could do that imo is by giving Ryze a 200 / 500 / 800(+110% AP) AoE meteor nuke in place of his stupid "#LCSBIGPLAYS" team teleport ult.

> [{quoted}](name=Ragnaveil,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=a3WL31ZR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-03-25T15:46:26.650+0000)
>
> Change got pulled.

I knew it was experimental, but I wonder what the reason was for pulling it back. More adjustments needed? Didn’t feel right? Couldn’t find anything on Repertoir’s Twitter :/
He just needs a bit of his old self in that kit to balance it out. Not even joking.
Just bring back defense and make it so damage dealers have to use skill instead of instantly killing. We won’t have these shit problems anymore.

On a serious note, Yes his new ultimate would've been very fitting of him but it sounds overpowered
I would like if they kept the healing chance as his current bloodwell feels very bad to use and it just feels unfair and unlucky if it runs out last second or they simply wait it out
Aatrox seemed in a fine spot, I don't like how his kit is centered around one ability but it worked well, Sure he was annoying and oppressive in lane but that was the point, He's supposed to be an early game lane bully who peaks mid game and falls off late, and it certainly felt like that
If they just wanted to buff him, Revert the most recent nerf to his E, give back some of the healing and his second E, Removing them really really screwed him over, and reduce his Q damage late game
And after that they could possibly increase his W damage and decrease his Q so he's not entirely centered around one ability
In other words, make him completely useless..... please keep your stupid comments to yourself.

> [{quoted}](name=Dark Ruger,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=a3WL31ZR,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2019-03-30T17:39:23.950+0000)
>
> In other words, make him completely useless..... please keep your stupid comments to yourself.

As you offer absolutely no suggestions and I offered two
One of which was just a revert and the other was to make it so he doesn't just have one main focus on one single ability which many people agree is an issue with him
His revive as of now is already an issue because you just throw yourself at them and they can just wait it out and it feels like bad lack
Please tell me how this would make him "completely useless"

And maybe think next time before ironically refering to something as a stupid comment
When you provided absolutely nothing to the conversation and only make a rude remark
I don't think they ever intended for this to ship, but were just gathering the community's thoughts, and making a note that they were looking into messing with Aatrox a bit more.

The heal part was a good change IMO even if it did remove the revive, but the no cd Q was just too much.

If they still wanna go with that I think it'd be better if they just made his ultimate reduce his Q cd by some percentage that scales up with ult level, something like 20%/30%/40%.

They changed so much tough and for better. It was beyond stupid that people would literally wait for your R to finish and kill you right after, with this one you get healed even if you don't die in the end of his ultimate.
I think they took the right decision, it's just a shame that he lost the iconic revive that he had.
Also, everytime he casts his Q, his E's cooldown reset. Truly a ultimate worthy of the name "World Ender"
"its literally this item except it does nothing that the item does except reduce CDS", so its literally the same as every cdr item, illaoi ult, kat passive etc.
